title: [1.4.7~1.6.4][SSP/SMP]Dem Apples DEM苹果
author: Y的世界
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Y的世界 于 2014-8-12 12:54 编辑 
DEM苹果 Dem Apples
我是小可乐，大家好~
我又为大家翻墙带来了一个mod[DEM苹果]！
不过有一个事情愧对于大家！我未找到1.7.X以上的版本！
在此对大家说声对不起！
这个是168搬运的版本

他的版本没有最低，只是提供1.6.4
这个mod添加了许多许多东西，不仅仅只是更多的苹果！
-介绍-

这个MOD增添了30+种苹果在游戏内，还有更多的物品哦，下面是一览图！





添加列表.jpg (87.17 KB, 下载次数: 13)

下载附件

添加列表
2014-8-12 11:41 上传






苹果





苹果.png (241.6 KB, 下载次数: 13)

下载附件

苹果
2014-8-12 12:15 上传











dem-apples-mod_6752352.jpg (92.11 KB, 下载次数: 13)

下载附件

2014-8-12 12:54 上传






并且添加了 apple flower[苹果花]！
矿物





矿物.png (214.33 KB, 下载次数: 13)

下载附件

矿物
2014-8-12 12:27 上传






可以看到，各种矿石都有了粒哦！连肉粒都出了呢..
各类锭也都出了哦！*新添了俩套工具！
怪物





邪恶的苹果.png (331.34 KB, 下载次数: 13)

下载附件

邪恶红苹果
2014-8-12 12:32 上传






邪恶的红苹果
邪恶的红苹果只能在森林和山森林群落地下和地上在黑暗中发现，他们掉落1 - 2个红苹果！
血量：40





邪恶的绿苹果.png (339.08 KB, 下载次数: 10)

下载附件

邪恶绿苹果
2014-8-12 12:32 上传






邪恶的绿苹果
邪恶的绿色苹果只能在丛林和地面在黑暗中发现，他们掉落1 - 2绿苹果！
血量：60





邪恶的黑苹果.png (379.32 KB, 下载次数: 13)

下载附件

邪恶黑苹果
2014-8-12 12:33 上传






邪恶的黑苹果
邪恶的黑苹果只能在末地发现，他们掉落1 - 2黑苹果！
血量：80
*添加了新的怪物蛋
 -提示-
我介绍的只是一些部分，还有更多的items等你寻找呢！
希望你可以在这个MOD中找到你的乐趣！
更新日志
V1.5 For MC Forge 1.6.4 "The Pyrite Update" : 18 days ago -7/24/14
 *Fixed potion effect levels being wrong for all apples 
*Fixed the crafting recipes for diamond armor using diamond ingots 
*Fixed the crafting recipes for chainmail armor using chain rings 
*Fixed the crafting recipe for "Emerald Apple" 
*Fixed the crafting recipe for "Diamond Apple" 
*Fixed the crafting recipe for "Redstone Apple" 
*Fixed the crafting recipe for "Glowstone Apple" 
*Fixed the crafting recipe for "Iron Apple" 
*Changed the name of "Fools Gold Ore" to "Pyrite Ore" 
*Changed the name of "Fools Gold Block" to "Pyrite Block" 
*Changed the name of "Fools Gold Ingot" to "Pyrite Ingot" 
*Changed the name of "Fools Gold Nugget" to "Pyrite Nugget" 
*Changed the name of "Fools Gold Apple" to "Pyrite Apple"
*Changed the name of "Enchanted Fools Gold Apple" to "Enchanted Pyrite Apple" 
*Changed the name of "Fools Gold Pickaxe" to "Pyrite Pickaxe" 
*Changed the name of "Fools Gold Shovel" to "Pyrite Shovel" 
*Changed the name of "Fools Gold Sword" to "Pyrite Sword" 
*Changed the name of "Fools Gold Hoe" to "Pyrite Hoe" 
*Changed the name of "Fools Gold Axe" to "Pyrite Axe" 
*Changed the name of "Wooden Apple" to "Oak Wood Apple" 
*Changed the textures for all Pyrite (aka fools gold) items and blocks 
*Red Apple Flowers now generate in forest and biomes  +Spruce Wood Apple +Birch Wood Apple +Jungle Wood Apple +Red Apple Flower 
V1.4 for MC Forge 1.6.4 "The Forge Update" : about a month ago -7/05/14 
*Updated mod to 1.6.4 
*Rewrote code to Forge 
*Now multiplayer compatible 
*Fixed the missing texture bug for "Chain Rings" 
*The crafting recipe for sponge now gives you "Synthetic Sponge" 
*Fixed the sponge(synthetic sponge) block not being bouncy 
*Fixed a bug with Evil Apple mobs 
*Made Evil Apple mobs more balanced 
*Made "Evil Red Apple" & "Evil Green Apple" spawn more offten 
*Fixed apples to give the correct amount of hunger bar and saturation 
*The crafting recipe for the "Rainbow Orb", "Heart Apple", and "Apple of Invisibility" is now shapeless (items can go into the crafting table in any formation) 
*Fools Gold will now generate in your world(Y level 29 & below in vains of up to 8) 
*All items now apear in the new "Dem Apples" creative tab 
*All apples with effects can now be eaten at any time (must be in survival mode to eat them) 
*Altered the Evil Red Apple mob texture 
 +Emerald Axe 
+Emerald Pickaxe 
+Emerald Shovel 
+Emerald Hoe 
+Emerald Sword 
+Fools Gold Ore 
+Fools Gold Block 
+Fools Gold Ingot 
+Fools Gold Nugget 
+Fools Gold Axe 
+Fools Gold Pickaxe 
+Fools Gold Shovel 
+Fools Gold Hoe 
+Fools Gold Sword 
+Fools Gold Apple 
+Synthetic Sponge 
+Golden Chain Ring 
+Diamond Ring 
+Enchanted Fools Gold Apple 
+Golden Apple Apple 
+Golden Swag Apple 
+Diamond Swag Apple 
 -Minus Sign Symbol 
-Plus Sign Symbol 
-Divided By Symbol 
-Equals Symbol 
-Exclamtion Point 
-Test Items
END
